observation.content:
# Task List

1. ✅ Phase 1: Read and understand the problem

2. ✅ Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests

3. ✅ Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files

4. ✅ Phase 4: Create test script to reproduce the issue

5. ✅ Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution

6. 🔄 Phase 6: Implement the fix

7. ⏳ Phase 7: Verify the implementation

8. ⏳ Phase 8: Final review and testing

task_list.title: Phase 1: Read and understand the problem
Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests
Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files
Phase 4: Create test script to reproduce the issue
Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution
